document_data.mainbody:
haan was a githyanki child from Crèche Yllek on Toril in the late 15 century DR.
Ghaan had a shaved head and was dressed in leather pants and pauldrons of githyanki design.
Githyanki of what would become Crèche Yllek, attacked and claimed the Rosymorn Monastery of Lathander in the Western Heartlands sometime in the late 15 century DR. Ghaan was hatched in the Crèche and, along with other gith children, attended military and combat training around the , during the Absolute crisis.
